reviews.review: 没有什么好说的，希望外挂控制更好
if only there's no cheater scums
Game makes brain go hurt hurt but AK go Brrrrrrrr Brrrrrrrr
Love it constantly find myself coming back to this game even after taking over a year break.
586小时，箱子劝退，55连开给一堆垃圾，正版不碰网站玩家，G胖破财害命。裂网真香，闷子哥，真强。
Só botando algo pra ganhar conquista :)
Fun game make me angry live love laugh
This game is good but hurts brain

I don't think there is any problem at all with the gameplay, i would like to say a near perfect game. But there is one problem which is the players. Some of them are amazing and i've met new friends but others are just super annoying
This game is honestly one of a kind.
good game but full of cheaters

Since going free to play there are a lot of new players. This is the biggest positive change to the community in years. New operation has been a blast. One of the game modes in the first week felt very half life based and I really enjoyed that. The game is fun again.
This game is pretty epic ngl. But it can have those wtf moments where it doesnt feel fair to play against others.

El mejor FPS sin dudas, problemas? obviamente, uno de ellos y para mi de los mas recurrentes, la comunidad, por experiencia propia la europea (este) es de las peores, encuentras siempre rusos que hacen el juego injugable, lo que mas recomiendo es jugar con amigos si es posible tienen que ser minimo 4 para poder sacar la partida adelante.

Eso si, al agarrarle el gusto al juego, conocerte los spots, los humos, los preaims, los prefires, etc, el juego se convierte en el juego mas satisfactorio de todos.
This game is a classic for PC and a must try for anyone who has steam now that its free to play.
Muito bom, um dos melhores jogos já lançados!
La joya de siempre, pero ahora, por si fuera poco, GRATIS! x)

very cool very swag i like it

edit: still okay i guess
honestly one of the best games I have ever played but some of the people in this community are toxic but I met some of my friends here

This game is like a rollercoaster!

This may be one of the most toxic game when it comes to competitive matchmaking but even worse when theres throwers and "ear raping teammates" but overall it is a fun game to play. You can just relax maybe warmup on aiming in a casual or death match for another game with similar aiming. In competitive you can tryhard your way to the top and maybe you can even rank Global Elite!!!
(Probably not going to happen). So far the valve anticheat system is pretty good in competitive as I have not experience that much games with a hacker put in (thats if you have prime matchmaking).
Jogo muito bom, só falta adicionar novas operações e melhorar o anticheat.

O jogo eh bom, muitos cheaters e com graficos nao tao bons, mas RECOMENDO PRA KRL.
